full_text.2: @khaal53 I’d argue that Pulisic playing at 9 with Reyna/Weah/Aaronson as wingers might be the best option. I’d hate to limit Pulisic’s coverage and inclusion, but he played some at Chelsea.
full_text.3:
Left Wing

Aaronson and Pulisic are locks, simple, with Aaronson being used primarily as a 'super-sub' to provide a spark off the bench

Jordan Morris will be used in a similar light, but will be brought on to score goals. His inclusion should keep Arriola out of the squad
